sentences.sContent: Why This Works: Talcum powder, an ingredient in both chalk and baby powder, is a natural ant repellent.
sentences.sContent_eng: Why This Works: Talcum powder, an ingredient in both chalk and baby powder, is a natural ant repellent.
sentences.sCn: 为何如此：滑石粉是粉笔和婴儿爽身粉的组分之一，它是天然的蚂蚁排斥物。

sentences.sContent: The growth of in-flight advertising "is repellent to these passengers" — an "insult" to paying customers, he says.
sentences.sContent_eng: The growth of in-flight advertising "is repellent to these passengers" — an "insult" to paying customers, he says.
sentences.sCn: 飞行中广告的增长“乘客对这些广告是排斥的” – 是对一个付费用户的“不尊重”，他说。

synos.tran: [化学]排斥的；[助剂]防水的；弹回的；令人讨厌的
